Package cs3500.easyanimator.view

Class ViewImplTextual

java.lang.Object
cs3500.easyanimator.view.ViewImplTextual
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView
public class ViewImplTextual
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView
A textual implementation of a animation models view. Allows for output to a file or console.

    • generateView

      private void generateView() throws java.io.IOException
      Method to return the appendable so that it can be outputted to the proper channels.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the appendable cannot be written to.

    • getAnimationLog

      private java.lang.String getAnimationLog​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet>> animationList, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​IShape> shapeIdentifier)
      Given a shape of type IShape and an animation of type ISynchronisedActionSet and a String representing the shape's unique name. Prints out the state of the shape before and after the animation is applied. This is returned as a string in a log formation in regards to the shape. Assuming that it is a part of the 'shapeIdentifier' HashMap, this method will also put the mutated shape in the map.
      Returns:
      A string that prints out the full animation state for the total time.

    • getAnimationDescription

      private java.lang.String getAnimationDescription​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet>> animationList, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​IShape> shapeIdentifier)
      Prints out a more detailed description of the animations in the IAnimationModel for the visually impaired.
      Returns:
      A string that prints out the full animation description for the total duration.

    • addFeatureListeners

      public void addFeatureListeners​(IControllerFeatures features)
      Description copied from interface: IView
      Passes the features of the controller of type IControllerFeatures to the view. Allows the view to retrieve these features from the controller to execute the proper reaction.
      Specified by:
      addFeatureListeners in interface IView
      Parameters:
      features - the possible actions that the controller supports, of type IControllerFeatures
